member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode
member.summary: Provides the possible behavior options for data groups when the check-mode is activated in .

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode.Standard
member.summary: Data groups can be independently checked or unchecked without affecting their children.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode.Automatic
member.summary: When a data group is checked or unchecked all its children are also checked or unchecked.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GroupCheckMode.None
member.summary: Data groups do not participate in the check mode.

member.summary: Occurs when a group header item container has been tapped.

member.summary: Occurs when an item within the group picker has been tapped.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.FilterDescriptorsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets an observable collection that contains a set of instances that are used to filter the current data source of the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupDescriptorsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets an observable collection that contains a set of instances that are used to group the current data source of the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.SortDescriptorsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets an observable collection that contains a set of instances that are used to sort the current data source of the control.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.ItemCount
member.summary: Gets the count of the data items in the current view.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.IsStickyHeaderEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value determining whether will show a sticky header on top of the viewport indiciating the currently visible data group in the viewport.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.StickyHeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that defines the appearance of the header displayed at the top part of the viewport.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerItemsPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets the group picker panel.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.IsGroupPickerEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value determining whether the group picker panel can be shown by tapping on a group's header.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.IsGroupPickerOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value determining whether the group picker window is currently opened.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerOpenAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation used to display the group picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerCloseAnimation
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation used to hide the group picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that represents the template used to define the visual appearance of a group picker.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerItemTemplateSelector
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that is used to select a template for a group displayed in the group picker panel.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupHeaderTemplateSelector
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that is used to select a template for a group's header.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets user-defined collection of items to be displayed within the group picker. If this collection is specified, user is responsible for handling the GroupPickerItemTap event.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.Groups
member.summary: Gets an array with all the top-level groups or null if no grouping data operation is applied.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupHeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the class that represents the template used to define the visual appearance of a group's header.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupHeaderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Style instance to be applied to group headers.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupPickerItemStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Style instance to be applied to the group picker items.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.GroupDescriptors
member.summary: Gets an instance of the class that holds instances of the class which describe the data groups.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.FilterDescriptors
member.summary: Gets an instance of the class that holds instances of the class which describe the filters.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.SortDescriptors
member.summary: Gets an instance of the class that holds instances of the class which define how the data is sorted.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadJumpList.StickyHeader
member.summary: Gets the instance of that displays the sticky header.

member.summary: This property is internal because it is used in the unit tests for the control.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this control is properly templated.
